paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deliver me, O Lord, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;

paragraphs.content: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.

paragraphs.content: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison is under their lips. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison is under their lips. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Keep me, O Lord, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.

paragraphs.content: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.

paragraphs.content: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I said unto the Lord, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O Lord.

paragraphs.content: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O God the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

paragraphs.content: Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Grant not, O Lord, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.

paragraphs.content: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

paragraphs.content: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.

paragraphs.content: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.

paragraphs.content: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I know that the Lord will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.

paragraphs.content: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
